程序包 engine

类 Entity

java.lang.Object
engine.Entity
直接已知子类:
Booking, CovidTest, TestingSite, User
public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class for all entities in the system.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    protected void addValueToSchema()
    Build a request body (For Post request) Go through the template(created by initialSchema()) and get the value of each attribute from user input
    abstract void display()  
    boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
    override equals method as long as the entities' id is the same, they are same (contains method and remove method in Collection class will call this method)
    java.lang.String findValue​(java.lang.String field)  
    java.lang.String getEntityId()  
    java.lang.String getEntityInfo()  
    protected abstract void initialSchema()
    Add the required attributes to the entityInfo before let the user to create a new entity, we need to set a template(which attributes are required) for it When user create a new object, the attributes will be reset based on the template So, if there are more attributes required, we just add them here
    java.lang.String toString()
    Useful when printing current entity's info

    从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    clone, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      override equals method as long as the entities' id is the same, they are same (contains method and remove method in Collection class will call this method)
      覆盖:
      equals 在类中 java.lang.Object
      参数:
      obj - object to compare
      返回:
      boolean value, true if equal, false otherwise

    • addValueToSchema

      protected void addValueToSchema()
      Build a request body (For Post request) Go through the template(created by initialSchema()) and get the value of each attribute from user input

      It can avoid errors that caused by the missing required attributes. and we don't have to change everywhere outside if there are more or less fields required on Web side)

    • initialSchema

      protected abstract void initialSchema()
      Add the required attributes to the entityInfo before let the user to create a new entity, we need to set a template(which attributes are required) for it When user create a new object, the attributes will be reset based on the template So, if there are more attributes required, we just add them here

    • getEntityInfo

      public java.lang.String getEntityInfo()

    • findValue

      public java.lang.String findValue​(java.lang.String field)
